text: Fritz Egner (born 3 August 1949) is a German radio presenter. He was born in Munich, Germany. In 1978 Egner joined the regional broadcaster Bayerischer Rundfunk. At this time his two friends and colleagues Thomas Gottschalk and GÃ¼nther Jauch also joined. Since 2016 he hosts the radio shows Fritz und Hits and Stars und Hits for Bayern 3, in addition he also hosts the Christmas radio show Christmas Hits mit Fritz. ==Other websites== *BAYERN 3-Urgestein *Bayerischer Rundfunk at 60 Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:People from Munich Category:German television presenters
title: Fritz Egner
